comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content:
Nice photo.

Sir Harry was Governor of NSW, not Governor-General.

His ADC, seen at right, fromm1903 to 1909 was Leslie (later Sir Leslie) Orme Wilson.

Sir Leslie later became Governor of Bombay and later still Governor of Queensland.

Sir Harry appears with his daughter Rita who took over her mother's duties after her Lady Rawson's 1905 death.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/lifeasdaddy] Thank you for the corrections BobMeade, especially the info about Leslie Orme Wilson. Regarding his daughter, records show that her name was Alice. She is mentioned a few times in the newspapers nla.gov.au/nla.news-article72211037 Here is a link to a notice published in the Sydney Morning Herald in 1938, after she died. nla.gov.au/nla.news-article17431034 Thanks again for your help, we have now updated our database records.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
